message: I have a great opportunity for you! I'm offering you a fantastic product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate your offer, but $120 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.  What do you think?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I can meet you halfway and offer you a price of $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95.  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I think we can find a better middle ground. I'm willing to offer you a price of $105. This is my final counteroffer.
